Strompris API¶

Fetch data from https://www.hvakosterstrommen.no/strompris-api and visualize it.

Assignment 5

strompris.fetch_day_prices(date: Optional[date] = None, location: str = 'NO1') → DataFrame¶

Fetch one day of data for one location from hvakosterstrommen.no API.

Parameters:

  • date (datetime.date, optional) – _description_. Defaults to None.

  • location (str, optional) – _description_. Defaults to “NO1”.

Returns:

[“NOK_per_kWh”, “time_start”] data from the API for given date and location.

Return type:

pd.DataFrame

strompris.fetch_prices(end_date: Optional[date] = None, days: int = 7, locations=('NO1', 'NO2', 'NO3', 'NO4', 'NO5')) → DataFrame¶

Fetch prices for multiple days and locations into a single DataFrame.

Parameters:

  • end_date (datetime.date, optional) – last date for data to be collected. Defaults to None.

  • days (int, optional) – number of days until end_date. Defaults to 7.

  • locations (tuple, optional) – locations for data collection. Defaults to tuple(LOCATION_CODES.keys()).

Returns:

table with data collected for given dates and locations.

Return type:

pd.DataFrame

strompris.main()¶

Allow running this module as a script for testing.

strompris.make_url(date: Optional[date] = None, location: str = 'NO1') → str¶
Function creates an URL string for querying the hvakosterstrommen.no API.

URL example: https://www.hvakosterstrommen.no/api/v1/prices/[year]/[month]-[day]_[location].json

Parameters:

  • date (datetime.date, optional) – date for which data must be collected. Defaults to None.

  • location (str, optional) – location for which data must be collected. Defaults to “NO1”.

Raises:

ValueError – the date must be after 2nd of October 2022.

Returns:

URL string for querying the hvakosterstrommen.no API.

Return type:

str

strompris.plot_activity_prices(df: DataFrame, activity: str = 'shower', minutes: float = 10) → Chart¶

Plot price for one activity by name, given a data frame of prices, and its duration in minutes.

Make sure to document arguments and return value…

strompris.plot_daily_prices(df: DataFrame) → Chart¶
Plots the daily average price hvakosterstrommen.no API.

  • x-axis = time_start (day resolution)

  • y-axis = price in NOK

Parameters:

df (pd.DataFrame) – _description_

Returns:

altair chart

Return type:

alt.Chart

strompris.plot_prices(df: DataFrame) → Chart¶
Plots energy prices obtained from hvakosterstrommen.no API over time.

  • x-axis = time_start

  • y-axis = price in NOK

  • location gets its own line

Parameters:

df (pd.DataFrame) – data with prices over time

Returns:

altair chart

Return type:

alt.Chart
